sentences.en: But nature also pairs it with black to endanger or poison.
sentences.cn: 但是大自然也让黑色与黄色成双成对,以显示危险或毒害.

sentences.en: Calcium would endanger the health of patients with psoriasis.
sentences.cn: 缺钙会危及到银屑病患者的身体健康.

sentences.en: Development of the area would endanger wildlife.
sentences.cn: 开发这一地区将会危及野生生物。

sentences.en: He did it in the knowledge that it might endanger his life.
sentences.cn: 他做那件事时知道它可能危害他的生命.

sentences.en: He will endanger his freedom and even his life.
sentences.cn: 他将断送自己的自由,以至生命.

sentences.en: If you work hard without rest, you will endanger your health.
sentences.cn: 你若辛勤工作而不休息, 会把身体弄坏的.

sentences.en: It is illegal and could endanger other people's lives.
sentences.cn: 这是非法的，可能会危及他人的生命。

sentences.en: Smoking during pregnancy endangers your baby’s life.
sentences.cn: 孕期吸烟会危及胎儿生命。

sentences.en: Such offences as his profoundly endanger public security.
sentences.cn: 他这样的犯法行为极大地危及公共安全.

sentences.en: The debate could endanger the proposed Mideast peace talks.
sentences.cn: 这场争论可能会危害中东和谈的倡议。

sentences.en: They are accused of causing an explosion likely to endanger life.
sentences.cn: 他这样开车可能会危及生命.

sentences.en: Toxic waste could endanger lives and poison fish.
sentences.cn: 有毒废物可能危及生命，毒死鱼类。

sentences.en: Two men will appear before Birmingham magistrates' court today charged with possession of arms with intent to endanger life.
sentences.cn: 两名男子今天将在伯明翰地方法庭受审，他们被控持有武器，企图危害他人生命。

sentences.en: Valve leakage will endanger the environment and system operation.
sentences.cn: 阀门存在泄漏会对生产运行和环境会带来危害.

sentences.en: What can you arise to endanger between claret and medicaments?
sentences.cn: 干红葡萄酒与药物之间会产生什么危害 吗 ?

sentences.en: You will endanger your health if you smoke.
sentences.cn: 你如果吸烟,就会危及健康.

sentences.en: You will endanger your health if you work so hard.
sentences.cn: 如果你工作过度劳累,健康会受到损害.

words.tran_cn: 濒临灭绝的；有生命危险的

trans.tran_en: to put someone or something in danger of being hurt, damaged, or destroyed
to put someone or something in danger of being hurt, damaged, or destroyed
